transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Haan ji sir good afternoon.
Executive: Sir Chetan baat kar raha hu IndiaMART office se.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji aapne concern raise kiya tha kya issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Concern tha kisi se saman mangwaya tha baad me party phone nahi utha rahi thi.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To yahi issue tha abhi solve ho gaya sir abhi to.
Executive: Achha achha aur sir aap se baat hui thi raat ko aap bata rahe the.
Customer: Baat ye thi ki maine aapko bataya tha ki leads sahi nahi aa rahi mere paas.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji wahi wahi mai discuss kar raha tha.
Customer: Hai na to abhi bhi lead available ho rahi hai ya nahi ho rahi hai abhi bhi show kar rahi hai?
Customer: Ji sir sahi nahi aa rahi dekhiye leather aur milk ki koi lead nahi hai aur relevant lead koi nahi hai.
Executive: Achha jo aap bata rahe the ki aapko leads show nahi karti wo show hona start hui nahi show honi start hui?
Customer: Nahi hui kyuki aur kuch aur hi leads aa rahi hai mujhe nahi pata wo keywords aap kaha se utha rahe hain. Kuch bhi mai lead jab karne jata hu na ki ye lead mere kaam ki nahi hai waha par likha aa jata hai aap rubber cutting machine me deal nahi karte uska to kuch lena dena hi nahi hota rubber cutting me se.
Customer: Aap rubber cutting ke naam par kuch bhi kuch bhi de rahe ho kuch bhi usme ek word relatable bhi nahi hota cutting ka.
Executive: Maine aapki by leads kholi maine aapki by leads kholi location lagaya all India hai na ab mujhe aap dispose karke dekhiye koi bhi by leads lijiye usko waha par box bana aata hai na dustbin ka usko dispose kijiye waha par kuch bhi relevant nahi hai rubber cutting ke bare me wo tabhi mujhse puchne lagta hai ki aap rubber cutting me deal nahi karte.
Executive: Sir ye sir jo maine category mention kari hai na jo mapping mention kari hai aapki ek second jo maine category yaha mention kari hui hai isse ki hamare paas mention hai for roll rubber sheet cutting conveyor machine rotary hai na ek category aapki ye hai.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Rubber mixing mill rubber mixing mill with stack blender ye bhi hai.
Customer: Sir ye nahi mai kya baat kar raha hu dekhiye koi bhi jo lead mere relevant nahi hai na mere kaam ki nahi hai aap usko dispose karke dekhiye wo rubber cutting se kaise related hai.
Executive: Ye wo leads aani bhi band ho jayengi agar maine usko dispose kar diya.
Executive: Ye access na mere paas nahi hota ki hum aapki jo leads hoti hai wo na hum consume kar sakte hai na kuch kar sakte hai wo sirf access aapke paas hi hota hai.
Customer: Sir dekhiye mai to setting nahi change kar raha hu kyuki maine to kabhi wo setting wala option khol kar bhi nahi dekha aaj tak ki inki setting kaise change karni hai. Aap me se kisi ki call aati hai ki aapki setting kharab ho gayi hai mujhe nahi pata kaise ho raha hai wo.
Executive: Ek hamare paas rubber machine hai automatic rubber slitting machine ye aapke paas available hai ya nahi hai?
Customer: Slitting sir slitting S L I T I N G slitting.
Executive: Haan ji ye available hai ya nahi hai?
Customer: Bilkul sir hai wo lekin abhi aap dekhiye jo ye baat kar rahe hai na rubber se wo ek HP ki motor mangi thi wo rubber band katne wali machine hai sir rubber band nahi hote jo chhote chhote rubber band hote hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hai na wo wo katne wali machine hai sir wo kam se kam 20-25 hazar ki machine hai sir mai kaha se usme supply karta firunga.
Executive: Okay okay.
Executive: Achha sir na mujhe aap se thoda sa time chahiye 5-10 minute ka ek video meet ka hum aapko aapki sari category dikha dete hai aapko jo sari problem aapko problem aa rahi hai na ki aapko lead show nahi karti aur jo aap bata rahe hai.
Customer: Sir aisa karo na mai free hokar aapke sath baithunga sir abhi mai workshop me hu mai free hokar aapko khud call karunga sir thik hai.
Executive: To at least mai matlab kab tak aap aap jo aapne bataya idea.
Customer: Sir dekhiye ye hafta to nahi hoga ab next week me dekhta hu.
Executive: Kab dekhenge?
Customer: Next week me agle hafte me.
Executive: Next week agle karenge achha ye bataiye jo aapne concern raise kiya tha ye concern sir ye mai concern close kar sakta hu ya nahi kar sakta hu?
Customer: Concern aisa tha sir party ne na maal galat bhej diya tha wo phone nahi utha rahe the baad me.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Haan thik hai to abhi unki call aa gayi thi aur complaint wagera ho gayi hai moderate change ko wagera karwa denge hum to aisa kuch.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Thik hai aur mai na aaj kuch mai abhi aapko whatsapp pe yaha se remove karta hu aapko bhejta hu sir puch ke mai kuch nayi category bhi add karunga aur ab mujhe concern aap close karne ke baad concern close kar du ab whatsapp mera number save kar lijiye koi issue mujhe call kar diya kariye.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul thik hai.
Executive: Chalega na aisa aisa koi dikkat to nahi hai aapko aur baki mai aap se na whatsapp me connect karta rahunga jab bhi aap free ho mujhe message dal dijiye ki Chetan sir Chetan ji mai available hu to mai aap se connect kar lunga uske baad mention kar dunga sir.
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai shukriya aur kuch naya product to aapko add nahi karna hai kuch naya hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Kuch naya product to add nahi karna hai aapko?
Customer: Naye product nahi sir abhi kuch nahi hai abhi add karenge next week me hi hoga sab kuch machine tayar ho rahi hai uski video wagera banegi fir mai aapko bhejunga fir hum wo add karenge thik hai.
Executive: Mai aapko whatsapp message karta hu sir okay thank you sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Party sent the wrong goods, not answering phone.

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Customer confirmed issue with party resolved.

- Executive offered video call to show categories.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back next week.

- Executive will send WhatsApp message.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, categories, rubber cutting, dispose, whatsapp
